name: B. Effects of Anti Pimples
statement:
Chaneka has an array [a_1,a_2,
ldots,a_n]. Initially, all elements are white. Chaneka will choose one
or more different indices and colour the elements at those chosen
indices black. Then, she will choose all white elements whose indices
are multiples of the index of black element and colour those elements
green. After that, her score is the value of a_i out of all black and
green elements.There are 2^n-1 ways for Chaneka to choose the black
indices. Find the sum of scores for all possible ways Chaneka can choose
the black indices. Since the answer can be very big, print the answer
modulo 998
,244
,353.
